Great learning curve and very fun/exciting, especially when playing with friends (swf). Killers can be toxic (camping you while on hook, etc) but that's just the internet... Highly recommend learning HOW to use your perks to your advantage. trust.
muy muy muy muy muy buen juego de equipo
Deveras legal, se seu pc rodar vale a pena.

I used to love this game but between the bugs, the Dev Team going against the community's wishes, microtransactions taking priority over QOL, and nonexistent report/banning system feedback, I can't recommend this game anymore.

Let me start with a few things:

LOAD TIMES

God. Awful. Sometimes 10-15 minutes before you can play with a full PC lobby. The solution from Devs? Allow cross-platform play. The problem? Lobbies are inundated with console teammates you CAN'T TALK TO in a game that RELIES on communication and teamwork.

MASSIVE ONE-SIDEDNESS

If a teammate is new, sucks or is just plain AFK and they die early, there's no bonus to the current survivors or help of any kind so now you have 3 people trying to get 5 (4 if lucky) generators finished before the killer offs them. I would say about 98% of those games end in failure from my perspective.

BUGS GALORE

Where do I start? The awful hitboxes? The lag when being hit because the servers are garbage? Stuck in random things? There are so many bugs, it would be impossible to name them all. They have not made a single good Quality of Life (QOL) update. Some hot patches for minor things but nothing major that actually fixes anything.

TOXIC KILLERS/SURVIVORS

I can't tell you how many times I have had a Hillbilly or a Leatherface absolutely face-camp hooked or downed survivors. Then the game rewards the killer by not letting him lose rank because he killed someone. Yet, if the survivors were to DC, they get a ban for 5 minutes (going up with each DC) which would give the killer a "quitter bonus". Then, I have seen survivors, as a killer, decide to troll the whole time with flashlights, vault perks, tea-bagging, etc. It's just a toxic amount of crap that the devs do nothing about and their "report" function seems to have zero effect especially when you look through DBD's forums of people who don't get banned consistently.

MICROTRANSACTIONS OVER QOL

I can't stress this enough but the killers aren't even nerfed/buffed in the way they should be by the time they release another killer/survivor duo. After all this time, the Clown is still a good killer but needs a buff. Same with Plague. Nobody hardly plays them anymore because they are so weak at this point from the lack of attention they need. Killers aren't reworked unless enough fuss is made and/or there's a game-breaking bug with them. For instance, they released "The Twins" but hadn't even finished the rework of Billy, Oni, or Pyramid Head. Things us players have asked for. Instead, they choose "GIMME THAT MONEY" over "Major QOL Update".

AND THE BIGGEST ONE OF THEM ALL THAT I WANT IMMORTALIZED IN STEAM REVIEW HISTORY:

MATHIEU COTE TELLING DBD PLAYERS TO "GO PLAY ANOTHER GAME IF KILLER IS FRUSTRATING"

YES. The moron actually said that and it's on YouTube. The main lead for the game told his game's community to go play a different game if we were frustrated with DBD. If that doesn't tell you how the Dev's actually feel about your opinion on their game, I can't help you.

Le concept du jeu est intéressant  et novateur, malheureusement le jeux n'en est qu'au stade de l'alpha et encore ...
Sur toutes les compétence seul 4 ou 5 ne sont utilisé par tous les bons joueurs.
Les survivants bien que étant considéré comme la proie du chasseur peuvent tourner à l'infini autour de palette, mur, ... sans que le chasseur ne puisse les attraper, et je ne parle pas des fenêtres qui si elle se trouve l'une en face de l'autre permette à nouveau au survivant de faire des boucles à l'infini.
Malgré toutes mes heures de jeux, toutes les parties se ressemble, sauf lorsque des noobs, ne connaissent pas le jeux, ne savent pas encore utiliser les problèmes de conception du jeux.
Dommage ce jeux avait du potentiel, mais les programmeurs passent l'ensemble du temps a ajouter des vêtements et autre items payant sans jamais régler les vrai problèmes.
This game fucking sucks. The devs don't listen and there are beyond too many issues. I still love it and play every day.
This game is so ridiculously buggy and broken but it is still pretty enjoyable

DBD - это когда ты поставила расширение как у HELLHOUNDа и тебе нужно вернуть обратно файл GameUserSettings... Меняешь на 2Кб, заходишь, выдает ошибку и начинаешь переустанавливать 2 ФАЙЛА!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! НА 900Мб, хотя был заменен 1 файл на старые 2Кб. Ни че так игрулька, жопоподгорательная.
